entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've successfully rescued the member of the Lok Revenants.
entries.journal_entry_description: Infiltrate the Sulfur Lake Pirate hideout and rescue a member of the Lok Revenants.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The prisoner is being held somewhere in the pirate hideout. Find him and convince him to follow you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Escort the prisoner to the extraction point.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Great work! I'm signalling the shuttle for pickup. Stay put.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Wait for the shuttle to arrive.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: I just received word that you rescued one of the Lok Revenants. I'm impressed.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Report to Stuvany Inglen that the rescue mission is complete.
